Santa_Monica.Brotman Medical Center:
Brotman Medical Center (BMC) is a hospital in Culver City, California, USA.


== History ==
The hospital was founded in 1924 by David M. Brotman. On September 1, 2005, Brotman Medical Center changed owners. The new owners are a group led by Prospect Medical Holdings, Inc., operating as Southern California Medical Center.
